Check ONLY the Dart file just modified for these anti-patterns. If found, fix immediately:
- `ref.watch(` outside `build()` → `ref.read(`
- `Dio().fetch(` without interceptors → add ResponseInterceptor + ErrorInterceptor
- Model file/class with `Dto` suffix → rename to `Model`
- `@freezed` class with `factory` missing `const` → `const factory`
- `@riverpod` function with `FooRef ref` → `Ref ref`
- `await ref.read(notifier).action(); ref.read(provider).when(` → use ref.listen in build()
